column2: Backport of Material dialogs with easy-to-use API based on DialogFragment

column5:
Migrated to AndroidX (#142)

* Migrated to AndroidX

Merge pull request #131 from pattM/layout_inflater_fix

Use LayoutInflater from Builder in Time/DatePickerDialogFragment.

Merge pull request #127 from cermakcz/feature/themed_dialog

Make it possible to style the dialog with a custom theme.

Make it possible to style the dialog with a custom theme.

Also uses the ?sdlPressedColor attribute for the pressed states instead of the hardcoded colors. This makes *_dark.xml drawables useless, so they were deleted.

The custom theme was used for the "Custom dialog" in the Demo app.

Merge pull request #120 from samerzmd/patch-1

Update sdl_styles.xml

Merge pull request #114 from major-laslo/master

useLightTheme() for forcing light theme on individual dialogs

Merge pull request #111 from marta-rodriguez/master

Dialogs fixed for tablets
Refactoring to properly support dark theme

Merge pull request #105 from marianeum/master

Use CharSequence instead of String to support Spannables
Use CharSequence instead of String to support Spannables

Merge pull request #99 from AnuraxSharma1512/master

Support for dark theme (closes #90)
Updated list dialog field visibility and Javadoc

Merged multi choice list from master
Refactored ListDialogFragment to be in conformity with release-2.1.0 style

Merge branch 'master' into release-2.1.0

Conflicts:
	build.gradle
	demo/src/main/java/com/avast/dialogs/DemoActivity.java
	demo/src/main/java/com/avast/dialogs/JayneHatDialogFragment.java
	library/src/main/java/com/avast/android/dialogs/fragment/ListDialogFragment.java
Refactored dialog listeners, cancel listener made common for all

Added proper cancelling of date and time picker dialogs
Removed ill-conceived IDateDialogCancelListener

Cherry-picked changes from master:
+ ListDialog request code support
- Removed magic numbers from demo
Overdue prepare for next development version.
Prepare for next development version (a bit overdue).

Merge pull request #88 from Kuratkoo/master

ListDialog request code support: needed because currently is not possible to differentiate two ListDialogFragments. Looks good to me, merging.
Refactored dialog listeners. Now supporting fragment and activity listeners together.
update to latest Android Studio & Gradle

Merge pull request #74 from ultraon/feature_extend_IListDialogListener

Extended IListDialogListener with additional method onCancel()

Merge pull request #62 from samerzmd/master

support RTL languages

Merge pull request #64 from willowtreeapps/showAllowingStateLoss

added method to show dialog allowing stateloss
added javadoc to showAllowingStateLoss() warning about it's use
added method to show dialog allowing stateloss
Cleaning up names of new dialogs
Simplifying demo - just one option for list

new interface OnListItemSelectedListener, reformatting with tabs (to stay consistent with the project coding style), removing method to set the listener, the fragment/activity which implements the listener, will be able to listen for the list item clicks of the dialog

Merge pull request #53 from arriolac/master

Adding support for neutral button.

Adding support for neutral button.

Fixing formatting.

Fixing formatting. Again.

Merge pull request #51 from VEINHORN/master

Added final static string constants instead of static.
Added final static string constants instead of static.
Target fragments will now work correctly.
Demo for Time and Date pickers
Better format for Date and Time listeners
onSelectedItemListener outside builder by overriding method show of BaseDialogBuilder returning a SimpleListDialogFragment instead of DialogFragment
onSelectedItemListener outside builder by overriding method show of BaseDialogBuilder returning a SimpleListDialogFragment instead of DialogFragment
setting up title + string array + positive button text from resources
SimpleListDialogFragment is a dialog that displays a simple list of items. Moreover, we can apply our custom style to the selector by adding new attrs

Improved the way it manages Time Zones, and allows for passing in a Date
object to initialize the values (Preserves non-date fields).

Revert "Adding project properties"

This reverts commit f377ed649191d86ffa918fb8e747619d573e23d6.

Revert "Removing files from index"

This reverts commit 25516e1ab9756837fb66e929673c1eeeab702065.

Adds a Date Picker Dialog Fragment, following the normal style, along
with a function to get the Date object back, either in UTC, or in a
specified TimeZone.

Merge pull request #34 from petrsimek/master

Thanks for making history with us :)
Upgrading to newer Android Maven plugin & support library provided
Support for icon next to title (closes #10)
Reverting pull request because getParentFragment() is not in support library v7
- remove setHtmlMessages methods because setMessage now allow to user spanned string or string resource with HTML markups

Merge pull request #19 from mrgoltstein/master

IllegalStateException when changing orientation with parent-Fragment as targetFragment

* setMessage() in builder now allow CharSequence instead of String
+ setMessage(messageResourceId) now handle richt text formatted resources
+ added setMessage(int resourceId, Object... formatArgs) which allow bind %s,%i, etc, in rich text formatted text resources

Merge pull request #21 from franklinharper/master

Add setHtmlMessage methods

Merge pull request #16 from mr-const/master

Extracted styles for title and message into theme declaration

Bugfix #18

For ISimpleDialogListener and ISimpleDialogCancelListener: if
targetFragment is not set, first fallback to parentFragment, then
fallback to Activity.
* made title/header style public, so it could be changed through attributes

Merge pull request #13 from petrsimek/master

setCancelableOnTouchOutside
Ensure to set cancelable=true when cancelableOTO=true
Issue #14 - message text color from theme
Setting canceledOnTouchOutside placed to onCreateDialog method of BaseDialogFragment
Better named method setCancelableOnTouchOutside. Code commented.

Merge pull request #8 from doubleencore/master

Adding button accessors and holo text colors to button text

- removed gradle cache directory
* updated .gitignore
* moved project readme graphics to better location
stick with primitive types, rename method to make the intention more clear
somebody here is crazy about Firefly
New progress dialog. Introduced BaseDialogBuilder that allows inheritance for builders
api update, demo app boost, new screenshot
fixed centering when one button text is longer

Breaking changes:

- removed show methods in the favor of Builder
- builder needs FragmentManager, not Activity
- fixed memory leak issue #2
- fixed Android dependencies issue #1
depend on android-support r7 since it's on central, added gpg plugin
pom info required to push to central
point to github screenshot - it's public
point to github screenshot - it's public
added screenshot that will be used on github
instead of our internal pom parent, use generic one with all necessary configuration

Be able to scroll if message is too long.
Protect some members that do not need to be public.
Fixed message margins on gingerbread.

+ requestCode in dialog callbacks
+ cancellation listener
+ SimpleDialogFragmentBuilder for easier SimpleDialogFragment creation
* raised version to 0.5.5

* updated title to support multiple lines
* raised version to 0.5.4

+ way to precheck list item in a dialog
* raised version to 0.5.3

* updated dialog styles - button panel wasn't showning under list
* raised version to 0.5.2

+ way to use simple dialog from fragments
* raised version of the library to 0.5.1
